rules.natural: In the event that the financial product is profitable, it is not suspended.

Whenever the condition is active, the game is operational.

In the case that it is not the case that if the substance is tested by quality control then it is pure, the electronic device is defective.

Should the substance not be compliant with regulations, the game is not operational.
